name: RWind
description:
Robowind is a 2d puzzle game made for Brackeys Game Jam 2020, having Rewind theme. RWind, an old robot, is trying to re-install his operating system (Robowind), but he needs the floppy disks for that.

Help him to find all the floppy-disks.

You can use arrow keys to schedule sequences and enter to execute them.  Keep in mind that the sequences are ignored if no valid moves are available (for example, a wall)

In menu screens, you cannot use mouse, only keyboard
